Traits.Name: Hypnotic Presence
Traits.Content: The Channeler can project a mesmerizing light from its screen, imposing disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being charmed for creatures within 30 feet.

Traits.Name: Static Shield
Traits.Content: The Channeler has resistance to damage from spells. Any time it takes damage from a spell, it can reduce that damage by its proficiency bonus.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Channeler makes three attacks, either using Mesmerizing Beam or Static Pulse. It can replace one of those attacks with Flickering Slap.

Actions.Name: Mesmerizing Beam
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Static Pulse
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage. The target is pushed 10 feet away if it is Large or smaller.

Actions.Name: Flickering Slap
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
